
place it into ~/.icons/ under ylm

this may be your gtk config:


# -- THEME AUTO-WRITTEN DO NOT EDIT
include ".themes/defaultgtkrc"

style "user-font" {
	font_name = "Sans 9"
}
gtk-cursor-theme-name="xpcursor"
gtk-icon-theme-name="ylm"
gtk-font-name="Sans 9"
widget_class "*" style "user-font"
# -- THEME AUTO-WRITTEN DO NOT EDIT
